mapper.select: select meal_type,dic.DICNAME,meal.id,meal_name,clothes_num,other_service from hm_erp_meal meal left join hm_crm_dictionary dic on dic.DICTYPE="meal_type" and dic.DICCODE=meal.meal_type and dic.COMPANYID=meal.company_id where company_id=#{companyId} and meal.service_id=#{serviceId} and meal_status=1
SELECT id,role_name,company_id FROM hm_erp_role WHERE company_id=1 AND role_name NOT IN('化妆师','摄影师')
SELECT dic.ID,dic.DICTYPE,dic.DICNAME,dic.PRIORITY,dic.ISSHOW,dic.COMPANYID,dic.DICCODE FROM hm_crm_dictionary dic WHERE dic.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND dic.DICTYPE = 'common_type'
SELECT ser.id,ser.service_name,ser.service_status FROM hm_erp_service ser WHERE ser.company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT dic.ID,dic.DICTYPE,dic.DICNAME,dic.PRIORITY,dic.ISSHOW,dic.COMPANYID,dic.DICCODE FROM hm_crm_dictionary dic WHERE dic.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND dic.DICTYPE = 'meal_type' ORDER BY dic.ISSHOW DESC,dic.PRIORITY
SELECT dic.ID FROM hm_crm_dictionary dic WHERE dic.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND dic.DICTYPE = 'meal_type' AND dic.DICNAME=#{dicName}
mapper.insert: INSERT hm_crm_dictionary (DICTYPE,DICNAME,PRIORITY,COMPANYID,ISSHOW,DICCODE) SELECT #{dicType},#{dicName}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(dic.PRIORITY),0)+1 FROM hm_crm_dictionary dic WHERE dic.COMPANYID=#{companyId} AND dic.DICTYPE='meal_type'), #{companyId},#{showFlag}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(dic.DICCODE),0)+1 FROM hm_crm_dictionary dic WHERE dic.COMPANYID=#{companyId} AND dic.DICTYPE='meal_type')

insert into hm_erp_meal (meal_name, photo_type,meal_type,meal_status,meal_amount, memo,priority,clothes_num,company_id,service_id,other_service) values (#{mealName}, #{photoType}, #{mealType}, #{mealStatus}, #{mealAmount},#{memo}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(meal.priority),0)+1 FROM hm_erp_meal meal WHERE meal.company_id=#{companyId}), #{clothesNum}, #{companyId},#{serviceId},#{otherService} )
mapper.select: SELECT meal.id FROM hm_erp_meal meal WHERE meal.company_id=#{companyId} AND meal.meal_name=#{mealName}
mapper.update:
UPDATE hm_erp_meal
meal_name=#{mealName},
photo_type=#{photoType},
meal_type=#{mealType},
meal_amount=#{mealAmount},
memo=#{memo},
clothes_num=#{clothesNum},
meal_status=#{mealStatus},
priority=#{priority},
service_id=#{serviceId},
other_service=#{otherService},
WHERE id = #{id} and company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.id other_service,r.role_name other_service_name,dic.DICNAME photo_name ,meal.id,meal.meal_name, meal.photo_type, meal.meal_type,meal.meal_status, meal.meal_amount,meal.memo,meal.priority,meal.clothes_num,meal.company_id,meal.service_id,ser.service_name FROM hm_erp_meal meal LEFT JOIN hm_crm_dictionary dic ON dic.DICCODE=meal.photo_type AND dic.COMPANYID=meal.company_id AND dic.DICTYPE='common_type' LEFT JOIN hm_erp_role r ON r.id= meal.other_service AND r.company_id=meal.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service ser ON ser.id=meal.service_id AND ser.company_id=meal.company_id where meal.company_id=#{companyId}
